titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Benzoic acid, 2-(((((4-methoxy-6-methyl-1,3,5-triazin-2-yl)amino)- carbonyl)amino)sulfonyl)-, methyl ester.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/19/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on Benzoic acid, 2-(((((4-methoxy-6-methyl-1,3,5-triazin-2-yl)amino)- carbonyl)amino)sulfonyl)-, methyl ester.
